summary: A follower spawned from the use of the wonderful Noiral Race created by Wyldsong.
descriptionHtml:
FILE 1.0 IS FOR USE WITH THE 1.3 NOIRAL FILE, 1.1 IS FOR THE UPDATED 1.4 NOIRAL FILE. Wyndsong changed essential data in the .esp so my Phineas file needed to be updated. Please let me know if there are still problems due to this update.

Phineas is my new male follower, born of the Noiral race he has his own bag of tricks. The only mods required are...
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24397] Wyldtats Presents The Noiral by Wyldsong[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168] ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
Everything else Wyldsong has in the race mod. For a list of his powers and stats you should check out the Noiral description when you download it. I have given him an ebony bow and two ebony daggers. You will find him at The Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.

Installation: NMM recommended.

Manual, put the Phineas.ESP file in your skyrim/data file. The textures and meshes files drop into the Skyrim/Data file in
textures and meshes. Hopefully you know the drill:) Open the Nexus Mod Manager to make sure the plugin is active and if you
 are running UFO make sure Phineas plugin is after UFO in the load order.


Uninstallation: NMM delete Phineas Follower Mod.
Manual, Delete Marque.esp file from Skyrim/Data file. Delete Alerik.esp in Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint file. Delete Phineas.esp from your
Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom file. Win.

If you are running UFO or something similar make sure Phineas.esp is below it in the load order.

***The Armor in the example screenshots is from Immersive Armors by Hothtrooper44***
[URL=http://imgur.com/VAMnL][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VAMnL.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


ONCE AGAIN Wyldsongs NOIRAL RACE AND APACHIISKYHAIR MAIN FILE ARE REQUIRED OR THIS MOD WILL CTD YOUR GAME!
author: SerecenHwke
